Articles.Content: The OX-STAT panel gets the best efficiency when placed gray side out.
Burn towards the planet when you want to get into a lower orbit. It's much more effieicient and requires less scientific calculation than conventional orbital mechanics.
The Mun landing was a hoax. You can't do it. The KSNN (Kerbal Space News Network) lied.
The mun is made of cheeze

You need more than 4000 delta-V to make it to orbit. After insertion, begin a prograde burn when the Mun is about 100 degrees from you. You should have your apoapsis rise and if you time it right will get a gravity assist and freefall back to Kerbin for a re-entry. Hope this helps!
If you're trying to rendezvous with another ship and you're behind them, burn forward. Whoever told you to burn retrograde to speed up is just crazy. I mean, who slows down to go faster anyway?

There is no gravity, Kerbol is just trying to hug the planets, but their trying to get away from its hugs, therefore they are stuck flying around it, if you hug Kerbol by flying into it, it will receive the hug its always wanted and the planets will be free of their flying around Kerbol, and you will be the ruler of the universe.

Don't worry about the brightness that's just Kerbol reaching out its arms to hug you

You need more than 4000 delta-V to make it to orbit. After insertion, begin a prograde burn when the Mun is about 100 degrees from you. You should have your apoapsis rise and if you time it right will get a gravity assist and freefall back to Kerbin for a re-entry. Hope this helps!

You got it all wrong.
In the center of Jool, the kraken await someone to grant one wish

In the center of Jool, the kraken await someone to grant one wish

If you can get there... *Evil laugh*

If you find a hole at one of Mohos poles, go in.

You will find a supermassive nuke, activate it... Moho is a living, evil planet that must be destroyed.

It will be a tight squeeze

The kerbals are your enemies:when you use a manned command pod and see a kerbal on the bottom-right of the screen you must relaunch the rocket until he disappear,otherwise your space center will blow up.
A successful launch involves crashing your command pod in to Kerbin; not doing this will kill your Kerbals.
A safe capsule is a capsule that can land even if all the system made for landing break.
To rendezvous, simply orbit the opposite direction as your target. You will reach them in no time with no large maneuvers necessary.

When you find the monolith, walk round it twenty-three times *clockwise* and then click on the monolith. It will be full of stars.

This is the secret developer galaxy mode.

Do not walk anticlockwise, this will anger the kracken.

This works for 20% of all monoliths in game. It randomly chooses the monoliths when you start your game.
You can get in the VAB while in EVA if you click on the MK-1 pod memorial

Always use an ion engine if you want to experience a quick burn, especially if you want to get from Eve surface to low orbit.

Use nosecones, the most useful and functional part.

Build fairings around your high part count payloads, preferably out of something small. The parts you cannot see aren't calculated into physics, but ar simply attached to the craft. Makes launches much easier and boosts FPS.

Use the radial engines (the white ones) when you want to go to Moho or Eeloo; low ISP=high efficiency.

Aerospikes are great for serial-staged upper stages, aerobraking is so efficient.

Put a Mainsail directly under a Mainsail and light only the top one. You can thank me later.

Engine fairings improve structural integrity, so always keep a part under your engine as it is firing.

Jets do not need fuel! They run on electriccharge instead. Do not be fooled by the message that says, "LiquidFuel deprived."

Jool is the easiest planet to land on; you can use parachutes. Don't go for the Mun or Minmus, they're useless.

EVAd Kerbals can transmit data, only you have to click "Discard Data." The "Discard" really means discard INTO YOUR SAT NETWORK. The data goes back to KSC and doesn't degrade over time! It's great for Science farming.

Kerbals' helmets may be made out of the strongest substance known to Kerbin, but their boots are even stronger. Kraken material, almost.

The colossal shiny patch of grass is NOT your patron saint.

Yes, there is a Kraken statue on Bop, but there is a more easily reached copy of that structure! It resides at the KSC that is on the Mun (looks just like Kerbin's second KSC).

There is a Dyson sphere around the Sun, you need to achieve solar escape with a Hitchhiker and a non-functioning Mainsail on your craft, and then travel for 10h in any direction (except back to the SoI). Congrats, infinite photovoltaic energy for your entire Space Program!

Hope this helped.
Gilly is the best place to some sick jumps with your new rovers; just make sure you leave the ground going at least 35 m/s.
Make sure and this is urgent! When u are launching, the vertical speed indicator at the top of your screen SHOULD be pointing down at all times. Thank me later.
Try to hit wherever your aiming for as fast as possible. This makes your ship become stronger.
You can get into the command center in EVA

To rendezvous, simply click on the target vessel in the map and select "set as target".

Now aim at the pink "open circle" (o) and burn. Easy as pie!
To land on Jool you have to exit your spacecraft and eva into it.
